attributes.action: seek out and bring to book the administrators in the Expenses Office who are ultimately to blame for MP's claiming for expenses that were inappropriate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have heard much about the situation of MP's claiming for items now considered inappropriate but no one has questioned the responsibility of the administrators who should have been more vigilant to ensure taxpayers money was properly spent. These 'controllers' should be brought to book for lack of control and fired.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
